welcome_message_body: Welcome to Linkenheim-Hochstetten, Germany! Known for its charming architecture and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and soak in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heidelberg Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heidelberg Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
